lender.occupational_info: I started a video and audio production company with my wife after losing a job 3 years ago. We often work long hours, but we enjoy what we do and would like give others the opportunity to do the same.

lender.loan_because: My life has been blessed and I'd like to share some of my good fortune. Because I have a love of sewing and crafting, I like to support women using this means to get ahead in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of people who have had open heart surgery and heart procedures. I also work at a center where we screen for throat and colon cancer. I am a colon cancer survivor, so this is important to me.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: Throughout history, the middle class has always been the social group to demand change, fight for progress, and innovate human society. By investing in the small businesses of lower-class men and women in third world countries, I hope to encourage middle class growth in the developing world so that great changes can be accomplished.

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I have teamed up with StreetKids International to benefit young people. Micro loans is the best way for me to directly help young people make informed choices about their lives.
lender.occupational_info:
RamblingRat Overland Project benefiting Street Kids International
In June 2008, 35-year-old Tim Dennis from southwest Scotland embarked on an overland expedition around the world to raise awarness for Street Kids International.
Tim sold his house last year to fund his RamblingRat expedition, through which he aims to gain further understanding of the basic needs of people.
Throughout his journey, Tim has been sharing the experiences of the local people, cultures and lifestyles he encounters through his RamblingRat website.
November 2008 update
Tim has successfully crossed eastern Europe and Siberia. While in Vladivostock, Russia preparing to ship to Japan, he was interviewed by two Russian television companies, a Newspaper and a vehicle magazine. This has given Tim the opportunity to promote the work of Street Kids International.
While in Japan, Tim was invited to speak at Japanese schools. One of the schools was for Japanese children excluded from mainstream education. He spoke about his expedition and how he is benefiting Street Kids International.
With his unusual vehicle and cartoon friend Dylan he has managed to talk about street youth around the world. Tim set up all his camping equipment to create a hands-on campsite which communicated the importance of the basic needs of water, shelter, food and safety.
Tim has now boarded a freight ship with his car and arrives in Vancouver Canada in mid November. He plans to visit Alaska and the Arctic Ocean before heading east to Street Kids International's offices in Toronto in early 2009.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because:
I think that microfinancing is a better way to help people in need than simply making donations. It has three main advantages:
(1) normally you'll get back your money after a while,
(2) it is more respectful towards the people who receive your loan as it honours their capacity to build a future for themselves,
(3) by doing so it helps to more durably support these people.
lender.occupational_info: Teaching teenagers how to use computers.

Who I am is not important; it is the love that I have for all of you that matters.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: It brings me and my family (Mom, Janny, Chuck & Georgie) great joy knowing that we can help another person or family across the world to be able to sustain a good life for themselves and to work for change and to hopefully end poverty. This is a proactive way to “give” and “give back” and it is wonderful to know who you are directly affecting and to watch them thrive and grow. It is a blessing to be part of Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I am a marketing professional with over 10 years of experience and I strategically market and sell a business, product or service. I have worked with high tech and medical device companies throughout my career in Massachusetts. I also offer marketing communications services to small business owners to enhance their business through the use of newsletters, direct mail, account management, web content, editing, strategy, marketing plans, branding, promotions, events, and client/public relations.

lender.loan_because: It's a way to extend the help that I've received in my own life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach fifth graders. I work in a school where children love to learn. By the time they leave fifth grade, they love poetry and books (if they didn't before). We study Greek mythology and how American government works. Community is an important part of our learning. Connecting communities, the way Kiva does, is something these students understand.

lender.name: Thore Aalvik

lender.loan_because: it's the best return on my investment that I can imagine

lender.name: Kale
lender.loan_because: We want to help out more people, and We firmly believe in the concept of micro credit. We want to see the cause of micro credit expand with more money and more people receiving loans. . A lot of these people we cannot reach in person, so we appreciate an organization such as Kiva to expand micro credit's efforts around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We help to supply voices for use in television commercials. For the commercials displaying a product or business, that you can't see a person talking, but a voice is heard explaining the product or business. I help provide the voices to the person creating the commercial, and sometimes my own voice is used.

lender.name: Kari Anne og Willy
lender.loan_because: Kiva rocks !!!!!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe in opportunity!

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: My mate Tim said it was a good idea, and it is! I hope it makes a difference. I am basically lazy and this is a nice way to feel like I am taking part in something good. See, its not just Bill Gates who gets into Philanthropy!
lender.occupational_info: I work from home and my business partner lives hundreds of miles away from me. But the work is done via the internet as we are involved with advertising on Google and SEO (search engine optimisation). I also sell camping loo's, but only in the UK, its not making a fortune, but where there's muck, there's brass!

lender.loan_because: I feel good that I am helping people in need.

lender.occupational_info: I am 10 years old, and I am in 5th grade.

lender.name: Ronan
lender.loan_because: Supporting entrepreneurs and growing businesses is something I care about, particularly small businesses in developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: I work with Google

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It was a Christmas gift from my sister which got me interested. It's a great organization, so have responded by giving gifts to other friends and family to get them started.
lender.occupational_info: I work part time as a travel agent, but my main work is with "Dance Victoria". We present dance companies in Victoria at our civic theatre. Everything from classical ballet to contemporary dance. We also have numerous community outreach programs having to do with dance.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I too am an entrepreneur and enjoy seeing other entrepreneurs have the opportunity to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I operate a business that structures, raises capital for, and invests in asset management firms. We build our business by focusing on meeting the needs of our institutional investors.

lender.name: Laurie
lender.loan_because: my mother always said to be kind. Loaning $25 to someone in need is a small act of kindness.
lender.occupational_info: I help make the diagnosis of disease, especially cancer, by studying tissue samples under the microscope. I am married with an 18-year-old son and a 15-year-old daughter.

lender.name: Drye
lender.loan_because: If simply lending a small amount of money can help anybody, I'm all for it.
lender.occupational_info: I help develop business web applications and webpages.

lender.name: Jackie
lender.loan_because: Finding finances to open a business can be a big obstacle. I experienced this in opening my business. Thanks to a microloan, I now operate my business which sustains me and continues to grow and flourish. I would like others to experience the joy, fulfillment and belief that anything is possible by taking the step to pursing their passion.

lender.name: Lilli
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: better to use than to squirrel away
lender.occupational_info: I build illusions. I like motorcycles and pigs

lender.name: Ken & Mary
lender.loan_because: To break down barriers between cultures and to share what I have.
lender.occupational_info: Ken works to reduce the energy consumption of one of the largest organizations in the USA to make the planet a better place to live. Mary works for the CEO of a group that helps the disabled learn work skills and helps at risk teenagers.

lender.name: James Chou
lender.loan_because: It is important to give back to humanity.
lender.occupational_info: Principal officer of Production company
